message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. Would you be interested in buying it for $130?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $120 is too low for me. How about we settle on $125?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $123. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
